Introduction
This topic contains information about the FOLQ, including
definition of FOLQ
purpose of FOLQ
how to access FOLQ
, and
when to use FOLQ
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Requests for Information From the Social Security Administration (SSA)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
